InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Scorpion GT-215 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 2

The Scorpion GT-215 is a hydraulically-driven Gatling-type rotary cannon designed to deliver smaller rounds at a very high rate of fire. The Scorpion is designed to shred armor on very fast targets, sacrificing power for absolute saturation of the target area.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Tempest II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The Tempest was designed with nothing but annihilation in mind. Utilizing FireStorm Kinetics' targeting technology, this proximity missile locks onto a target's cross section to draw conflicts to a swift conclusion.

InstalledItem.Name: Joker Defcon - Noise Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] Joker Defcon - Noise Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: STOP
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Utilizing a design that has proven itself time and again, the STOP shield generator by Seal Corporation has featured the same classic design for years due to its consistent, stellar performance.

InstalledItem.Name: DayBreak
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Sakura Sun knows exactly what you need. The DayBreak is a straightforward power plant that provides parity to its performance, durability, and stealth stats.

InstalledItem.Name: ColdSnap
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Well-balanced performance is the hallmark of the ColdSnap cooler from Lightning Power Ltd., thanks to its ability to easily process the extra heat your ship generates during your day-to-day travels.

InstalledItem.Name: ColdSnap
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Well-balanced performance is the hallmark of the ColdSnap cooler from Lightning Power Ltd., thanks to its ability to easily process the extra heat your ship generates during your day-to-day travels.

InstalledItem.Name: Odyssey
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Tarsus 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Adventure amidst the stars awaits with the Odyssey quantum drive. Careful and continued refinement from the Tarsus team has kept this component on the cutting edge for centuries.

InstalledItem.Name: Ping
InstalledItem.Description: Ping

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.
